mapper.insert: INSERT INTO post ( image_name, comment, member_id ) VALUES ( #{postImageName}, #{comment}, #{memberNo} )
mapper.select: SELECT member_id AS memberNo, image_name AS postImageName, comment, reg_date AS regDate FROM post WHERE member_id = #{memberNo}

SELECT mem.member_id AS memberNo, mem.user_name AS userName, mem.image_name AS profileImageName, po.image_name AS postImageName, po.comment AS comment, po.reg_date AS regDate, po.index AS postNo, ( SELECT COUNT(li.post_index) FROM `like` li WHERE li.post_index = po.index ) AS `likeCount` FROM post po LEFT JOIN members mem ON po.member_id = mem.member_id WHERE po.member_id IN ( SELECT target_member_id FROM follow fo WHERE fo.member_id = #{memberNo} ) ORDER BY regDate DESC;
SELECT post_index AS postIndex, member_index AS memberIndex, reg_date AS regDate FROM `like` WHERE member_index = #{memberNo}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO heart ( post_index, member_index ) VALUES ( #{postNo}, #{memberNo} )
